title: Sick
description:
If you hate hospitals, today's episode will leave you feeling a little sick. First, Sapphire shares a mother's story about her son who's been tormented by a horrifying lady. Then, we’ll visit a haunted hospital, prevent a young witch from becoming possessed, and then help a young girl transition into the afterlife.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
